snippet.title: One Piece Romance Dawn - 3DS -  Memories (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Re-experience the One Piece story for the first time ever in RPG format on 3DS!
Visit iconic places and take down mighty bosses like Buggy, Arlong, Crocodile, Rob Lucci along the adventures of the Straw Hat  pirates.

Level-up your characters and choose your own path to become King of Pirates! Join the Straw Hat Crew to defeat powerful enemies using a turn-based battle system and discover ingredients that will make your crew unique. You play, you decide, you make the adventure yours in this One Piece RPG on 3DS.

For more information, please visit your local Namco Bandai Games website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Like our Facebook page! http://www.facebook.com/namcobandaigames.europe

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
